## jx addon

Creates an addon

### Synopsis


Creates an addon

```
jx addon
```

### Options

```
      --helm-update        Should we run helm update first to ensure we use the latest version (default true)
  -n, --namespace string   The Namespace to install into
  -r, --release string     The chart release name (default "gitea")
```
